main.tagline: Bring your vision to life with unique, customizable tile designs that make every space truly yours.

mono.title: Mono Collection
mono.description: Mono Collection brings pure minimalism through tables crafted from the big format tiles. Simple lines and calming textures create a piece that fits effortlessly into any space, while the hand-finished details add warmth and authenticity.
mono.whyMonoDescription: Designed for modular living—pair two together for a layered coffee table moment or let a single piece anchor an entryway. Neutral palettes keep the focus on texture and proportion.

material.title: Material
material.description: Hand-poured composite with marble fragments for a mineral feel that stays cool to the touch.

finish.title: Finish
finish.description: Soft radius edges with a low-sheen sealant that resists stains without muting the speckled detail.

care.title: Care
care.description: Wipe with a damp cloth, spot clean with neutral soap. No special kits, no fussy upkeep.

mosaic.title: Mosaic Collection
mosaic.description: A celebration of craft and detail—this collection features tables built from carefully arranged small tiles. Each piece showcases rhythmic patterns, rich texture, and a handcrafted look that brings depth and character to any space.
mosaic.whyMosaicDescription: Mosaic tables stand out as functional art. Dozens of individual tiles come together to form unique tables that catch the eye and bring artistic energy into any room.

specs.paletteValue: Neutral colors, bright colors, tiles with effects

material.title: Material
material.description: Crafted from small ceramic and stone tiles set into a durable composite base, offering a textured, mineral feel.

finish.title: Finish
finish.description: Soft edges with a protective seal that resists stains while preserving tile color and detail.

care.title: Care
care.description: Wipe with a damp cloth and mild soap. No special cleaning kits or maintenance required.

mirror.title: Mirror Collection
mirror.description: Mirror Tables blur the line between furniture and light. Featuring reflective tile surfaces, each piece transforms its surroundings and expands the room visually while adding a refined, contemporary edge.
mirror.descriptionSecond: Bold yet elegant, Mirror Tables are designed to stand out without overpowering the space. Whether placed in modern interiors or used as a statement piece, they bring depth, brightness, and a sense of quiet luxury.
mirror.whyMirrorDescription: Mirror Tables stand out as functional art. Each piece reflects light and space, creating a dynamic visual experience that transforms any room. Precision-laid mirrored tiles paired with clean, architectural forms make these tables both distinctive and adaptable to your vision.

material.title: Material
material.description: Crafted from precision-cut mirrored tiles set into a durable composite base, creating a seamless reflective surface.

care.title: Care
care.description: Clean with a soft, lint-free cloth and glass cleaner. Avoid abrasive materials to maintain the mirror's clarity and shine.

lightAmplifying.title: Light Amplifying Surface
lightAmplifying.description: Mirrored tiles reflect natural and artificial light, making spaces feel brighter and more open.

distinctiveCharacter.title: Distinctive Character
distinctiveCharacter.description: Each table interacts uniquely with its surroundings, creating a dynamic and ever-changing look.

modernCraftsmanship.title: Modern Craftsmanship
modernCraftsmanship.description: Precision-laid mirrored tiles paired with a clean, architectural form.

customMade.title: Custom Made
customMade.description: Size, tile format, and layout can be tailored to your vision.

aboutPage.title: About Us
familyStoryCopy: We create handcrafted tables using tiles, marble fragments, and mirror panels. Each piece is made with care and attention to detail, bringing together traditional craftsmanship and modern design.
Our process begins with understanding your vision—whether you're looking for a statement piece for your living room or a functional work surface for your office.
From initial consultation to final installation, we're with you every step of the way, making sure the finished piece exceeds your expectations.

principles.craftCopy: We start with slabs, terrazzo fragments, and mirror panels to let the material dictate proportion, tone, and detail.
principles.scaleCopy: Every piece is drafted as a modular system so it can stretch from a single coffee table to a full lobby installation.
principles.touchCopy: Edges are sanded by hand, joints are tinted to match each surface, and every table is sealed with a soft-matte finish.

process.briefCopy: Share mood boards, floor plans, or color palettes. We translate them into rough geometry and finishes.
process.prototypeCopy: We build foam-core mockups, test tile layouts, and send photo updates or arrange a visit to review in person.
process.installCopy: White-glove delivery, on-site leveling, and care notes so the piece ages beautifully.

aboutPage.ctaCopy: Get in touch to review materials, see prototypes, or start a custom commission.
